column1: Little Goat Diner////Loved this place! Service was great and it was great "foodie" comfort food! Our party of 4 started out with the Bread of the Day which was Bacon Gouda. I seriously could have eaten this all night. We also ordered the crab dip served with Ritz crackers and it was perfect. Unlike Little Goat's sister restaurant
column2: the main dishes are not tapas style. We each ordered a full entree for ourselves: Pork Belly Pancake
column4: Grilled Cheese and the Skirt Steak and then a huge order of fries and Mac and Cheese for everyone to share. The portions were very generous and only my boyfriend was able to be a part of the Clean Plate Club. We all really liked we what we had ordered.
